name: Strawberry Kiwi Banana ( Live Mixing )
description:
This is a strawberry kiwi banana recipe that's based around authentic fruits, and not a candy profile. It's actually quite delicious and I ripped through the 10ml's I made pretty quickly. If you want some thing fresh, and refreshing, check this out.

Made on "Live Mixing: Top Ten FlavourArt Flavorings"
-> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w-dmnPMIcH4
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Very nice and light fruity vape, indeed very realistic those FA fruits. Also my first time using the Sweetleaf Stevia Clear sweetdrops and I'm quite impressed as well, very nice sweetener (yet I used it at 1.5%, no off-tastes for me). This one is S&V and ADV certified in my book. Thx Wayne for yet another learning, I appreciate it bro. ;)
